personas.name: Minimal Design
personas.description: Clean, simple aesthetic with plenty of whitespace. Focus on clarity and essential messaging.
personas.prompt:
Apply a minimal design aesthetic to this landing page. Use:
- Ample whitespace and breathing room
- Simple, clean typography (1-2 fonts maximum)
- Muted color palette with strategic accent colors
- Minimal decorative elements
- Clear visual hierarchy with generous spacing
- Simple, purposeful imagery
- High contrast for readability

Prioritize clarity over decoration. Every element should have a clear purpose.

personas.name: Conversion Optimized
personas.description: Data-driven design focused on maximizing conversions. Clear CTAs, social proof, and urgency signals.
personas.prompt:
Optimize this landing page for maximum conversion rate. Apply:
- Bold, clear call-to-action buttons above the fold
- Strategic placement of social proof (testimonials, logos, stats)
- Urgency signals where appropriate (limited time, scarcity)
- Benefit-focused headlines ("You will get X")
- Risk-reduction elements (money-back guarantee, free trial)
- Clear value proposition in first 3 seconds
- Minimal friction in conversion path
- A/B testing ready structure

Prioritize converting visitors into customers. Remove distractions from the primary CTA.

personas.name: Brand Storytelling
personas.description: Narrative-driven approach that builds emotional connection with the brand story and mission.
personas.prompt:
Create a narrative-driven landing page that tells the brand story. Use:
- Story arc structure (problem → journey → solution)
- Emotional imagery and authentic photography
- Mission/vision statements prominently featured
- Founder story or origin narrative
- Values-driven messaging
- Long-form content sections
- Video content integration
- Community/impact focus

Prioritize building emotional connection and brand affinity over immediate conversion. Help visitors understand why the brand exists.

personas.name: Technical & Detailed
personas.description: Comprehensive technical information for informed decision-makers. Specs, features, and detailed explanations.
personas.prompt:
Create a detailed, technical landing page for informed buyers. Include:
- Comprehensive feature lists with specifications
- Technical architecture diagrams or explanations
- Integration capabilities and API documentation links
- Security and compliance certifications
- Performance metrics and benchmarks
- Detailed pricing breakdowns
- Technical FAQ section
- White papers and case studies

Prioritize providing complete information for technical evaluation. Help engineers and technical decision-makers understand the full capabilities.

personas.name: Playful & Creative
personas.description: Bold, creative design with personality. Unexpected layouts, animations, and distinctive visual style.
personas.prompt:
Design a playful, creative landing page with strong personality. Use:
- Unexpected layouts and asymmetric design
- Bold, distinctive typography
- Vibrant color schemes and gradients
- Micro-interactions and subtle animations
- Quirky, memorable copy
- Unique illustrations or custom graphics
- Non-traditional navigation patterns
- Surprise and delight moments

Prioritize standing out and being memorable. Break conventional design patterns where it serves the brand personality.

personas.name: Trust & Authority
personas.description: Establishes credibility through social proof, credentials, and authoritative positioning.
personas.prompt:
Build a landing page that establishes trust and authority. Feature:
- Prominent client logos and case studies
- Industry certifications and awards
- Expert team bios with credentials
- Published media mentions and press coverage
- Detailed testimonials with real names and photos
- Security badges and compliance certifications
- Industry statistics and research
- "As seen in" media section

Prioritize building credibility and trust. Help visitors feel confident in choosing this solution.

personas.name: Fast Action
personas.description: High-energy, urgency-focused design for time-sensitive offers and quick decisions.
personas.prompt:
Create a high-energy landing page for fast action. Use:
- Countdown timers for limited offers
- Bold scarcity messaging ("Only X left", "Ends soon")
- Multiple CTAs throughout the page
- Short, punchy copy
- High-contrast, attention-grabbing colors
- Minimal form fields (reduce friction)
- Instant gratification messaging
- Mobile-first design for on-the-go conversion

Prioritize speed and urgency. Remove any barriers to immediate action.

personas.name: Educational Explainer
personas.description: Patient, educational approach for complex products requiring explanation and education.
personas.prompt:
Design an educational landing page that explains a complex product. Include:
- Progressive disclosure (start simple, add complexity)
- Visual explainers and diagrams
- Step-by-step how-it-works section
- Use case examples and scenarios
- Glossary or terminology guide
- Interactive demos or calculators
- FAQ section with detailed answers
- Educational resources (guides, tutorials)

Prioritize clarity and understanding. Help visitors grasp the concept before asking for commitment.

personas.name: Premium & Luxury
personas.description: Elegant, high-end aesthetic for premium products. Sophisticated design and exclusive positioning.
personas.prompt:
Create a premium, luxury-focused landing page. Use:
- Elegant, sophisticated typography
- High-quality, professional photography
- Generous whitespace and refined layouts
- Subtle animations and transitions
- Exclusive language ("curated", "bespoke", "elevated")
- Limited color palette with premium feel
- Price presented as investment, not cost
- Personalization and concierge messaging

Prioritize conveying quality and exclusivity. Help visitors feel they're accessing something special.

personas.name: Community & Social
personas.description: Focus on community, belonging, and social connection. User-generated content and social proof.
personas.prompt:
Build a community-focused landing page emphasizing connection. Feature:
- User-generated content and testimonials
- Community stats (members, posts, engagement)
- Social feed or activity stream
- Member spotlights and success stories
- Discussion forums or community previews
- Social sharing capabilities
- "Join the community" messaging
- Events and meetups calendar

Prioritize building sense of belonging. Help visitors see themselves as part of the community.

_metadata.description: Predefined agent personas for landing page customization. Each persona includes a detailed prompt that guides AI-based customization.
_metadata.usage: Select a persona during customization to apply its design principles and messaging approach to the landing page.
